titles.title: A bill to modify the application of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to Indian tribes.
A bill to modify the application of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to Indian tribes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to treat members of an unincorporated Indian tribe in the same manner as the stockholders of a corporation.
